projectDetail: Utilized React.js to develop dynamic and interactive components
Responsive design with Tailwind CSS to enhance the user experience
Implemented Firebase Auth for secure user registration and login
projectDescription: This project is a MERN stack application called LEGOBOTIC. It includes features such as dynamic and interactive components developed using React.js, a responsive design achieved with Tailwind CSS, and secure user registration and login through Firebase Auth.

projectDetail: Used ReactJS and Tailwind for visually user experience
projectDescription: FOODIXIR is a MERN stack application focused on providing a visually pleasing user experience. It is built using ReactJS and Tailwind CSS. The site is hosted on Netlify.

projectDetail: Used Elementor page builder that is helpful to customize for client
All the visual content is designed by me
projectDescription: ALVI USA is a WordPress website developed for a business. It is fully responsive and unique in design. Elementor page builder was used to facilitate customization for the client, and all the visual content was designed by the developer.

projectDetail: Blogging business development along with portfolio
Used Elementor for responsive design with popup newsletter
projectDescription: LEMETRIA is a WordPress portfolio website that combines blogging for business development and showcases a portfolio. It was developed using WordPress and utilized Elementor for responsive design. Additionally, a popup newsletter feature was implemented.
